benchmark_details.name: TituLLMs Benchmarking Datasets
benchmark_details.overview: We developed five benchmarking datasets to evaluate LLMs, particularly focusing on assessing world knowledge, commonsense reasoning, and reading comprehension specific to the Bangla language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish comprehensive benchmarking datasets for evaluating LLMs in their capacity to understand and generate Bangla.

data.source: Data collected from various educational websites, textbooks, and synthesized data generation.
data.annotation: Manual and automated methods including novel translation techniques.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated using the lm-evaluation-harness.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding of Bangla language tasks.
methodology.validation: Validation set sampled proportionally to maintain data heterogeneity.
